Hi Simon,
Pretty easy!!! 
1) Go to http://www.unrarx.com/ and download UnrarX
2) Install it 
3) Open finder and go to the directory that contains your downloaded maya.
4) Double click maya2012osx.rar. UnrarX will unpack all the files in sequence and you will get an iso file.
5) Double click the maya2012_osx.iso file and it will mount
6) In the mounted directory you will find the maya dmg file and a crack directory containing the crack dmg
7) Double click each dmg file to mount them.
8) Follow the directions in the install.txt file
9) Good Luck. Unfortunately I couldn't get the crack to work. Maybe you will have more luck :-)

Thank you for this torrent, Chris,!

To folks who can't get the activation code to work: If it's done exactly as it says in install.txt, it will work. Note section 7: Click on Mem Patch once the activation screen appears. If it is pushed before the activation screen, you will get a error-message saying that the activation code is wrong. Just click Back, click Mem patch and register again, and it should work just fine, even if the activation code don't fill all the boxes.

noctourne:

You will find the keygen (program which generates key for registering the program) in the folder Crack (mount xf-adesk2012.dmg). Read the install.txt (in the same folder) for info on how to install the program correctly.

noctourne:

The request code shows up in the autodesk activation window that pops up after you have selected that you want to have the activation code sent to you by e-mail or fax. Maybe you have to run Maya again to get to this window, I don't remember exactly. (The request code is unique and identifies your version of Maya with the details you have given in the registration prosess. It is used for generating an activation code)
